response.overview: The third installment of a Korean seasonal drama is based on Kang Hye-ji's short animation "Michael". This youth-oriented comic thriller follows three friends who, after facing workplace bullying, open a hamburger restaurant on a tight budget. While preparing the site, they discover a skeleton, a bag containing 300 million won, and name the skeleton "Michael." Using the money as "investment funds," they unwittingly entangle themselves in unraveling the mystery of Michael's death.
response.title: Michael: The Iron and Skeleton Corpse
